params.name: textMessage
params.doc: Prepended message to send with the deeplink.

docs.summary: Sends an SMS to a communication channel. The SMS contains a deep link to the Wix app.

body:
curl POST 'https://www.wixapis.com/virtual-numbers/v1/agents/12345678-e3ab-4a32-869a-f11234512345/channels/12345678-68bc-42bb-b719-f11234512345/send-app-link' \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8' \
    -H 'Authorization: <AUTH>'
    -H 'Content-Type: text/plain' \
    -d '{
      "textMessage": "Deeplink message prefix: "
    }'

params.name: textMessage

params.name: text
params.doc: Message to send to the communication channel. Must include `[code]` as a placeholder for the verification code.

docs.summary: Starts the verification process by sending a code to a communication channel

body:
curl POST 'https://www.wixapis.com/virtual-numbers/v1/agents/12345678-e3ab-4a32-869a-f11234512345/channels/12345678-68bc-42bb-b719-f11234512345/verification' \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8' \
    -H 'Authorization: <AUTH>' \
    -H 'Content-Type: text/plain' \
    -d '{
       "text": "Your verification code [code]"
   }'

hourOfDay
members.doc: Time part representing the hour of a day.

members.name: minuteOfHour
members.doc: Time part representing the minutes of a hour.

members.name: statusUpdatedDate
members.doc: Date the verification status was updated

members.name: channel
members.doc: a specification of the communication method and details

members.name: revision
members.doc: Revision number. When updating, include the existing `revision` to prevent conflicting updates.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Communication channel verification status.
 Only verified communication channels can use the business number
 to make and receive calls and messages.

docs.summary: Someone who can send and receive calls and messages through the business phone number

members.name: wixUserId
members.doc:
Agent Wix user Id. Taken implicitly from the context when an Agent is created.
 Used when the Agent initiating a call to extract caller phone number.
 In addition, for inbound calls, if the call is redirected to an Agent, this Id is
 used to notify the Agent about the incoming call with caller details.

members.name: revision
members.doc: Revision number. When updating, include the existing `revision` to prevent conflicting updates.

docs.summary: An agent's hours of availability for this virtual number account

members.name: availability
members.doc: Schedule of agent's availability to receive calls

members.name: mutedUntilDate
members.doc:
Indicates if an agent is unavailable for calls.
 When null, the agent will receive calls according to their `availability` settings.
 When set to a timestamp, the agent won't receive calls until the timestamp shown in this field.

members.name: revision
members.doc: Revision number. When updating, include the existing `revision` to prevent conflicting updates.

members.name: communicationSettings
members.doc: Describes which communication forms are allowed for this agent

members.name: defaultAvailability
members.doc: Determines if the agent's availability is resolved by his custom availability settings or by the account's `activeHours`

members.name: id
members.doc: WixMedia ID (if the recording is stored in WixMedia)

body:
{
  "virtualNumberAccountId": "12345678-e00b-46a3-ab92-f11234512345",
  "sessionId": "12345678-16ec-3eb0-a0e5-bead6e4c4415",
  "startTime": "2020-05-26T06:13:40Z",
  "endTime": "2020-05-26T06:14:10Z",
  "businessNumber": "+12093xxxxxx",
  "from": "+15091xxxxxx",
  "to": "+15095xxxxxx",
  "contactId": "12345678-11af-41d6-a6c9-f11234512345",
  "status": "VOICE_MAIL",
  "direction": "INBOUND_DIAL",
  "recording":   {
    "id": "XXXXXXXXXX",
    "url": "https://path/to/recording",
    "duration": 6
  },
  "transcription":   {
    "id": "XXXXXXXXXX",
    "url": "https://path/to/transcription",
    "introduction": "Hey, just leaving here a message, please call back when possible."
  },
  "callId": "XXXXXXXXXX"
}

members.name: virtualNumberAccountId
members.doc: The id of the virtual number account associated to the call record

members.name: sessionId
members.doc: The unique session identifier of the call

members.name: agentId
members.doc: The agent id of the agent participating in the call

members.name: startTime
members.doc: The start time of the call

members.name: endTime
members.doc: The end time of the call

members.name: duration
members.doc: The duration in seconds of a completed call

members.name: businessNumber
members.doc: The business number associated with the call

members.name: from
members.doc: The phone number from which the call was made

members.name: to
members.doc: The phone number of the recipient of the call

members.name: contactId
members.doc: The optional contact id of the user-of-user who participated in the call

members.name: status
members.doc: The reported status of the call

members.name: recording
members.doc: The optional reference to the audio recording of the call

members.name: transcription
members.doc: The optional reference to the transcription of the call

members.name: callId
members.doc: The unique call identifier issued by the Telco provider

members.name: virtualNumberAccountId
members.doc: The id of the virtual number account associated to the sms record

members.name: timestamp
members.doc: The timestamp of the sms record

members.name: businessNumber
members.doc: The business number associated with the sms record

members.name: uouNumber
members.doc: The phone number of the user-of-user associated with the sms

members.name: contactId
members.doc: The optional contact id of the user-of-user associated with the sms

members.name: status
members.doc: The reported status of the sms

members.name: numSegments
members.doc: The optional number of segments required by the carrier to sent the sms

members.name: externalId
members.doc: The optional external reference id. Available for outbound sms

members.name: sessionId
members.doc: The unique session identifier of the sms message

members.name: smsId
members.doc: The sms identifier issued by the Telco provider

members.name: offset
members.doc: Index of the first returned record

members.name: total
members.doc: Total records that matched the request

docs.summary: The business phone number and its settings

members.name: friendlyName
members.doc: Human-readable name. Shown in the Wix UI.

members.name: type
members.doc: Whether the phone number is a local, toll free, or mobile number.

members.name: revision
members.doc: Revision number. When updating, include the existing `revision` to prevent conflicting updates.

docs.summary:
Set of Boolean properties that indicate whether a phone number can receive calls or messages.
 Supported capabilities are: Voice, SMS, and MMS.

members.name: language
members.doc:
Greeting language, expressed as BCP-47 language tag
 Supported languages: `en-US` (US English), `en-GB` (UK English), `es-ES` (Spanish), `fr-FR` (French), `fr-CA (French Canadian).
 Note: for backward compatibility, `en` will be accepted and handled as `en-US`

members.name: revision
members.doc: Revision number. When updating, include the existing `revision` to prevent conflicting updates.

docs.summary:
Contains the agent, voicemail greeting, and additional settings that specify how to handle calls through the business phone number.
 and related settings for the voicemail greeting and agents

members.name: agents
members.doc: Agents who can use the business phone number

docs.summary: An entity representing AccountInfo - which holds the details of the account

members.name: name
members.doc: Display name, usually shown in the UI

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: Date the virtual number account was created

members.name: updatedDate
members.doc: Date the virtual number account was updated

members.name: statusUpdatedDate
members.doc: Date the account status was updated

members.name: revision
members.doc: Revision number. When updating, include the existing `revision` to prevent conflicting updates.

members.name: activeHours
members.doc: Default active hours for the account agents to receive calls

docs.summary: an entity representing user preferences related to the account.

members.name: callerId
members.doc: Which phone number to show for inbound calls. Defaults to BUSINESS_NUMBER.

members.name: record
members.doc: Whether calls are recorded. Defaults to DISABLED.

members.name: transcription
members.doc: Whether calls are transcribed. Defaults to DISABLED.

members.name: voicemail
members.doc: Whether voicemail is enabled. Defaults to ENABLED.

members.name: voicemailNotification
members.doc: indicates if voicemail notification is enabled for this account. Defaults to ENABLED.

members.name: ringingTimeout
members.doc: Indicates the maximal time (in seconds) that an incoming call will wait before being redirected to a voicemail

members.name: incomingCallConnection
members.doc: Indicates how to connect incoming calls. Defaults to DIRECT.

members.name: agentRingingTimeout
members.doc: Indicates the maximal time (in seconds) that an incoming call will wait for a specific agent before moving on to the next agent (when using ROTATION `callForwardingMode`)

members.name: callForwardingMode
members.doc: Determines how incoming calls will be forwarded to available agents

docs.summary: an entity representing the voicemail message that will be played for the account

members.name: systemDefault
members.doc: Whether the greeting is the default greeting

members.name: limit
members.doc: The number of items to load

members.name: offset
members.doc: number of items to skip in the current sort order

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by

members.name: fields
members.doc: Projection on the result object - list of specific field names to return. If fieldsets are also specified, return the union of fieldsets and fields

members.name: fieldsets
members.doc: Projection on the result object - list of named projections. E.g. "basic" will return id and name fields. Specifying multiple fieldsets will return the union of fields from all. Specifying fieldsets and fields will also return the union of fields.

members.name: fields
members.doc: Fields to include in the response. By default, all fields are returned.

members.name: email
members.doc:
An email field to specify which contributor should be added as an agent.
 If no such contributor - an invite will be sent to this email

members.name: acceptLink
members.doc: if an invite was sent - this is the link to accept it

members.name: email
members.doc:
An email field to specify which contributor should be invited as this agent.
 If not provided - the pending invitation for this agent will be re-sent (if exists)

members.name: acceptLink
members.doc: if an invite was sent - this is the link to accept it

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • SUNDAY
  • MONDAY
  • TUESDAY
  • WEDNESDAY
  • THURSDAY
  • FRIDAY
  • SATURDAY

an enum representing the possible statues of a channel Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • PENDING
  • VERIFIED
  • UNVERIFIED

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED_AGENT_STATUS
  • INVITED
  • ACTIVE
  • PENDING

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED_CALL_STATUS
  • ONGOING
  • COMPLETED
  • FAILED
  • BUSY_OR_NO_ANSWER
  • CANCELED
  • STARTED
  • VOICE_MAIL

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED_DIRECTION
  • INBOUND_API
  • OUTBOUND_API
  • INBOUND_DIAL
  • OUTBOUND_DIAL

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED_SMS_STATUS
  • SENT
  • RECEIVED
  • FAILED
  • DELIVERED

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED_DIRECTION
  • INBOUND
  • OUTBOUND

an enum representing the possible number types Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • LOCAL
  • TOLL_FREE
  • MOBILE

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_GENDER
  • MALE
  • FEMALE

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_VOICE_GENDER
  • MALE
  • FEMALE

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_VOICE_TONE
  • TONE_A
  • TONE_B

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED_USAGE
  • CALLS_INBOUND
  • CALLS_OUTBOUND
  • API_CALLS_INBOUND
  • API_CALLS_OUTBOUND
  • SMS_OUTBOUND
  • SMS_INBOUND
  • MMS_OUTBOUND
  • MMS_INBOUND

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED_UNIT
  • CALLS
  • SMS
  • MMS
  • Minutes

an enum representing the possible states of an account Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • ACTIVE
  • PENDING
  • SUSPENDED

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_FORWARDING_MODE
  • SIMULTANEOUS - all available agents will receive incoming calls simultaneously, until some agent answers the call
  • ROTATION - incoming calls will rotate between available agents one by one (according to specified order) until one of them answers

an enum representing the possible caller-ids for presenting on inbound calls Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_ID
  • BUSINESS_NUMBER
  • CALLER_NUMBER

an enum representing the possible states for settings properties Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_STATE
  • DISABLED
  • ENABLED

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_CONNECTION_TYPE
  • DIRECT
  • CONFIRM

`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the `Value` type union. The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`. Possible values are:
  • NULL_VALUE - Null value.

Possible values are:
  • ASC
  • DESC
